74.教室の授業が 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n自分の教室で 授業を:
The classroom has been liberated!The more classes you take in your classroom, the more skill notes you'll be able to get. And the more classes you take, the higher
your skill level will be, and the better skill notes you'll get... Once you have a lesson ticket, you can take a class...

298.追加スキルが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\nフウキの仲間に 追加:
Additional skills have been unlocked!
By giving SCC members additional skills, they'll be able to take on a much wider variety of roles.
Try choosing additional skills for each member!

451.購買部が 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n解放された 購買部のお店:
The purchasing department has been liberated!In the new Purchasing Department, you'll be able to buy equipment, gifts, and much more... If you have any Felds or Felmarks,
the school's currency, you can go to the Purchasing Department and exchange them for your favorite items...

637.教練バトルが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n教練バトルは 学園内:
The training battle has been unleashed!A training battle is a challenge battle where four players in the school work together to take on a boss monster. By defeating boss
monsters, you can create powerful weapons and accessories, and obtain the Asfeld Medal of Light... If you lose, you don't lose
anything, so talk to the committee members in your classroom and actively participate in the training battles...

915.新しいお店が 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n購買部に 新しいお店:
The new store has been opened!A new store has opened in the Purchasing Department. In the new store, you can buy more powerful accessories. In the new store,
you can buy accessories that will make you and your friends even more powerful.

1078.サマー★ナイトが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n自分の教室から\:
Summer's Night is now unlocked! You may now participate in the Summer's Night training battle from your classroom.
Emerging victorious will allow you to create new Festival Accessories, so prepare yourself and give it a try!

1247.絆エピソードが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n仲間との 絆のチカ:
The bonding episode has been released!When the power of the bond between you and your friends reaches level 3, a bond episode will occur with that character... Through
these episodes, you'll be able to deepen your bonds with your friends...

1411.学園コーデが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n学園コーデは 装備の:
The school code has been liberated!The school code allows you and your friends to change the appearance of your weapons and accessories while maintaining the strength of
your equipment. Talk to Miss Lunedore in the sewing room to learn the school code...

1581.プラチナクラスが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n自分の教室から\:
The platinum class has been released!You can now participate in the platinum class of training battles from your own classroom. Winning the platinum class will allow you to
upgrade to more powerful equipment. Prepare yourself for the challenge...

1753.スキル強化が 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\nフウキの仲間たちの:
Unlocked Skill Enhancement!
The skills that the SCC members have learned can now be enhanced to make them even more powerful.
Head to back to the Strategy room.

1876.？？？が 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\nシュメリア先生が\n何か:
??? is now unlocked! Ms. Sumeria seems to have something planned...
The next time you have a day off, try talking with her.

What? has been released!<me 60>It looks like there's another plan afoot.
I'll talk to Dr. Shumeria after I finish
episode 8...

2214.チャンスとくぎが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n戦闘中に チャン:
Unlocked Chance skills!
During battle, when your Chance skill activates, SCC members will automatically use their Chance skills.
When they learn a Chance skill, you can check its effects in the "Stats" menu.

2395.ウィンター★ナイトが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n自分の教室か:
Winter's Night is now unlocked! You may now participate in the Winter's Night training battle from your classroom.
Emerging victorious will allow you to create new Festival Accessories, so prepare yourself and give it a try!

2573.ロイヤルクラスが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n自分の教室から\:
The royal class has been released!You'll be able to participate in the royal class of training battles from your own classroom. If you win the Royal Class, you'll
be able to upgrade to more powerful equipment. Prepare yourself for the challenge...

2745.部活動が 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n部活に入ることで 鍛冶:
The club has been liberated!By joining a club, you'll be able to try your hand at blacksmithing, woodworking, sewing, and other crafts... Talk to the head of the
club in each club room in the second school building and join your favorite club activity.

2922.オータム★ナイトが 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n自分の教室から:
Autumn's Night is now unlocked! You may now participate in the Autumn's Night training battle from your classroom.
Emerging victorious will allow you to create new Festival Accessories, so prepare yourself and give it a try!

3095.購買部の新商品が 解放された！\n<me 60>\n<br>\n購買部の新商品と:
New items in the purchasing department have been released!New accessories have been added to the purchasing department... You can buy these new accessories to enhance yourself and your
friends...
